title: WTB T206 Fred Clarke Portrait Low Grade DIff Backs
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Fred Clarke Portrait Low Grade DIff Backs
posts.post_content:
I've decided to start working on a back run of the T206 Fred Clarke Portrait.  I'm looking for very low grade, inexpensive examples.  The only damage that is a deal-breaker is extensive back damage.  At the moment, I am not interested in any card that would grade above a 1.  
Here's what I still need:

Pied 150
Pied 350
SC 150 fact. 25
SC 150 fact. 30
SC 350 fact. 30
Brown Hindu
Old Mill

If you have anything you'd like to sell, send me a scan and a price to [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks for looking and thanks to tedzan for giving me a list of all the backs that this card has.
Weekend bump.  Any Clarke beaters out there?
Any Old Mill or Hindus out there?
